data.title: Matthew & Jessica Buchanan: Buchanan Family Arts
data.meta_description:
Buchanan Family Arts & Artisan Services is a family owned and operated company, by Jessica & Matthew Buchanan . Jessica has a Bachelors in Fine Arts/Interior Design from the Atlanta Art Institute, has a love for photography, and is an avid sewing enthusiast. Matthew has been involved in all facets of the high end construction industry for over 10 years, and has had a lifelong pas-sion for the Arts & Crafts. 

We would be thrilled to take your remodeling and specialty projects to the next level! With our competitive and affordable pricing for every budget, we are a one stop shop for all of your projects’ special needs. We pride ourselves on attention to detail and superior craftsmanship with every project, no matter how large or small. Our drive and determination allow us to get your job done in a timely manner as we work with you to create the “one of a kind” result you desire!

Here are some of services we offer:

Remodeling
- Interior Design and space planning (CAD, Drafting) 
- Complete room remodel, including kitchens and baths	
- Finished Basements	
- Decks & Fences
- Structural and Partition wall framing
- Light Electrical and Plumbing	
- Install and Finish drywall	
- D oor and Window, removal and install	
- Trim molding install	
- Wall paper elimination	
- Interior painting
- Tiling applications	
- Wood and Laminate flooring	
- Access to granite fabricators	

Specialty trim and Wood Working Applications 
- Coffered ceilings
- Multiple piece crown molding application
- Beam install 
- Paneling
- Custom built-ins, Cabinets, and Bars
- Custom furniture fabrication
- Concealed doors and hidden passageways
- Mantels
- Modified door openings
- Curves and Archways
- Solid wood counter tops
- Butcher blocks
- Custom and Fantasy Play sets

Specialty Finishes (Faux and Decorative)
- Cabinet Refinishing	
- Venetian Plasters	
- Clay and Synthetic Plasters	
- Decorative Stucco	
- Wall Glazing and Washing	
- Gold leaf	
- Multilayered Antiqued Finishes	
- Concrete Stain	
- Stenciling
- Custom Wood Stain and Dye application

Sewing & Monogramming
Baby / Toddler Personalized Items & Gifts
- Boppy Covers
- Shopping Cart Covers
- Bibs
- Burp Cloths
- Diaper Covers
- Cloth Diapers and Accessories (wet bags, cloth wipes)
- Custom Diaper Bags
- Boutique Children’s Clothing
- Portable Cloth High Chair
- Custom Hair Bows
- Custom Crib Bedding – sheets, quilts, bumper pads, decorative pillows

Quilting Projects 
- Memory Quilts (made from baby clothes)
- T-Shirt Quilts (made from T-shirts)
- Custom Quilts - Traditional and Modern designs and fabrics
- Quilted Home Décor – placemats, table runners, pot holders, mug rugs

Car Seat Covers (both PDF pattern or handmade to specification available)
- Britax Roundabout
- Britax Marathon
- Most all car seats, infant carriers or booster seats

Sewing
- Christmas Stockings
- Christmas Tree Skirts
- Ornaments (quilted, customize with pictures, names, dates, team logo, etc)
- DSLR Camera Strap Covers
- Home Décor 

Monogram & Machine Embroidery
- Baby gifts
- Children’s Clothing
- Home Décor – napkins, pillows, pillowcases
- Handbags

Arts
- Commissioned Fine Art (drawings, paintings, sculptures)
- Renderings (Home Exterior, Interior)

Jewelry
- Chain Maille Sterling Silver Jewelry 
- Custom Jewelry Designs
- Gemstone wrapping

Photography 
Mobile studio comes to your home or destination of interest
- Family
- Children
- Maternity
- Homes, Architecture, Products, Artwork


We enjoy the work we do and take a lot of pride in the finished product. We have experience in everything listed above. If you or anyone you know is in need of any of these services listed or something similar, please pass us along.

Our website is currently under construction, but will be available soon.

Thank you for your continued support in local artistry and craftsmanship. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you in the future!
